title: Calories in Schlotzsky's Sandwich
meta_description: Discover calories in Schlotzsky's Original sandwich, including macros like protein and fat, plus tweaks and FAQs for better choices.
assumptions: Small Original sandwich on sourdough with ham, salami, turkey, cheeses, olives, mustard, and veggies; no sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, size, customizations, and preparation; check Schlotzsky's app or menu for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One small Schlotzsky's Original sandwich has ~810 kcal and ~40 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with menu info.

faqs.q: How many calories in a small Schlotzsky's Original?
faqs.a: About 810 kcal for the small size.

faqs.q: What are the macros for Schlotzsky's sandwich?
faqs.a: â‰ˆ90 g carbs, 40 g protein, 35 g fat per small Original.
Yes, around 2000 mg per small sandwich due to cured meats and bread.
Removing bread cuts ~400 kcal, leaving ~410 kcal from fillings.

faqs.q: How does Schlotzsky's compare to other sandwiches?
faqs.a: Higher in sodium and carbs than plain deli sandwiches but similar calories to fast-food options.
